name: daily
description: Use this command to claim your daily bonus and reset your claim cost!

name: todo
description: List a recommended list of things to do!

name: auction
description: Use this command to claim your daily bonus and reset your claim cost!

options.name: sell
options.description: Sell a card on auction

options.name: query_arguments
options.description: Put the card query arguments here to filter for a specific card to auction!

options.name: list
options.description: See what cards are currently on auction

options.name: query_arguments
options.description: Put the card query arguments here to filter for a specific card to auction!

options.name: info
options.description: See information about a current or past auction!

options.name: auction_id
options.description: Put the auction ID you want more info about here!

options.name: bid
options.description: Bid on a currently running auction!

options.name: auction_id
options.description: Put the auction ID you want to bid on here!

options.name: price
options.description: Put the maximum amount you are willing to pay here!

options.name: preview
options.description: View up to 25 auction info's at once!

options.name: query_arguments
options.description: Put any card query arguments here!

options.name: cancel
options.description: Cancel an auction you have placed without any bidders.

options.name: auction_id
options.description: Put the auction ID to cancel here!

name: cards
description: Use this command to see your cards!

options.name: query_arguments
options.description: Put any card query options here!

name: claim
description: Claim cards!

options.name: extra_arguments
options.description: Put an amount to claim more than 1 card at once, or promo if there is an ongoing event!

name: cards
description: Use this command to see your cards!

options.name: query_arguments
options.description: Put any card query options here!

name: cl
description: Use this command to claim your daily bonus and reset your claim cost!

options.name: history
options.description: View your claim history!

options.name: info
options.description: Get information about a specific claim in your history!

options.name: claim_id
options.description: Put the claim ID you want more info about here!

name: summon
description: Summon a card you own!

options.name: card_query
options.description: Specify a card you want to summon, or leave empty for a random card you own!

name: search
description: Search the card database for specific cards!

options.name: query_arguments
options.description: Put any card queries here!

name: boosts
description: Lists any ongoing card boosts or events!

name: boost
description: Use this command to claim your daily bonus and reset your claim cost!

options.name: info
options.description: Put the claim ID you !

options.name: boost_id
options.description: Put the boost ID you want more info about here!

name: balance
description: Display your current balances!

name: profile
description: Display your bot profile!

options.name: user_id
options.description: If you want to see someone else's profile, but their discord ID here!

name: has
description: Use this command to see if another user has a card!

options.name: user_id
options.description: The user you want to check

options.name: card_arguments
options.description: Specify the card you want to check!

name: favs
description: View your list of favorited cards!

options.name: card_arguments
options.description: Specify a card or card query here!

name: miss
description: View a list of cards you do not own!

options.name: card_arguments
options.description: Specify a card or card query here!

name: stats
description: View your daily stats!

name: achievements
description: View your list of achievements!

options.name: diff
options.description: Add -diff to see achievements you have not gained

name: vote
description: Get a list of websites to vote for the bot and gain rewards!

name: guild
description: Base for all guild commands!

options.name: status
options.description: Get the guilds current financial status(Only useful if you are locking the server)

options.name: info
options.description: Get the guilds current info

options.name: lead
options.description: View the guild leaderboard(activity based)

options.name: lock
options.description: View the guild leaderboard(activity based)

options.name: collection_id
options.description: The name of the collection you want to lock the guild to

options.name: unlock
options.description: Remove current guild lock

options.name: set
options.description: Set a property in the guild

options.name: tax
options.description: Set the guild's tax on claiming

options.name: tax_percentage
options.description: The % you want to tax on each claim

options.name: report
options.description: Set the bot report channel

options.name: bot
options.description: Set or add a channel to be used for the bot

options.name: unset
options.description: Unset a property in the guild

options.name: bot
options.description: Remove a channel to be used for the bot

options.name: manager
options.description: Subcommand group for adding or removing guild managers

options.name: add
options.description: Add a user to the guild manager list

options.name: user
options.description: User to add as a manager

options.name: remove
options.description: Remove a user from the guild manager list

options.name: user
options.description: User to remove as a manager

name: info
description: Display information about a card!

options.name: card_query
options.description: The card query/card name you want more info on

name: plot
description: Base command for all plot commands

options.name: list
options.description: List your plots in the current guild

options.name: collect
options.description: Collect from plots in the current guild

options.name: buy
options.description: Buy a plot in the current guild

options.name: global
options.description: List all of your plots you own across all guilds

options.name: info
options.description: Get information about a plot in the current guild

options.name: extra_arguments
options.description: Specify the specific plot number

options.name: upgrade
options.description: Upgrade a building already on a plot in the current guild

options.name: extra_arguments
options.description: Specify the specific plot number

options.name: status
options.description: Subcommand header for status

options.name: global
options.description: Get information about a specific plot in any guild

options.name: extra_arguments
options.description: Specify the specific plot number from plot global

name: preferences
description: Base command for everything related to preferences

options.name: set
options.description: Subcommand head for preference setting

options.name: notify
options.description: Notification Preferences

options.name: notification_options
options.description: The name of the option you want to toggle

options.name: show
options.description: Subcommand head for preference listing

options.name: notify
options.description: Notification Preferences

options.name: all
options.description: All Preference Groups

name: forge
description: Forge 2 cards of the same rarity to get another!

options.name: card_1
options.description: Enter either a card name, or card query here. If using query, only fill out this option!

options.name: card_2
options.description: Enter either a card name here if you entered a card name for card 1!

name: draw
description: Draw a 1-3 star non-event card of your choosing!

options.name: card
options.description: Enter either a card name, or card query here!

name: collection
description: Base command for all collection commands!

options.name: list
options.description: List the collections in the bot

options.name: extra_arguments
options.description: Add collection name or query to filter the collection list

options.name: info
options.description: Get more information about a collection in the bot

options.name: collection_id
options.description: Add the collection ID here

options.name: reset
options.description: Reset a collection for a clout star and a legendary card if the collection contains one

options.name: collection_id
options.description: Add the collection ID to reset here

name: help
description: Get help via our help menus!

options.name: help_menu
options.description: Specify the help page you want to display or leave blank to see all options

name: rules
description: Display the bot rules!

name: announcement
description: Display the current global bot announcement!

name: baka
description: Ping tester!

name: pat
description: Pat another bot user!

options.name: user_id
options.description: The ID of the bot user you want to pat

name: invite
description: Get the invite link to invite the bot to your own server!

name: license
description: The license the bot and it's code are under!
